channel.title: Managing Users on ArangoDB Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Managing Users on ArangoDB Documentation

item.title: Managing Users in the ArangoDB Shell
item.description: Connect with arangosh to the server or a Coordinator respectively. The module @arangodb/users exposes a JavaScript API to manage user accounts. Please note, that for backward compatibility the server access levels follow from the database access level on the _system database. Also note that the server and database access levels are represented as rw: for Administrate ro: for Access none: for No access See Managing Users for details and note that using wildcard database and collection access levels is discouraged.
